content: this wave lengths scarf has a classy look that gives you a great visual texture without being too overwhelming change the colors around to create a perfect fit for that special guy in your life this pattern could easily be unisex depending on the colors and type of yarn used the scarf is a relatively simple design using basic stitches done in a block style if you re looking for a design that isn t too feminine and that would look great try this out this pattern would be great for a father brother boyfriend husband nephew etc you will need the standard materials for this pattern yarn hook and needle for weaving in ends
